settings.text:
Become a co-owner of the brand defining urban swimwear

This is your chance to join Pond Copenhagen as an early investor, and help shape the future of our fast-growing lifestyle brand with global ambitions.

Your investment will be help us achieve our next milestones, and bring urban dipping to the global village!

See you in the pond!
Mikkel, Anders, Mads & Jesper

settings.author_title: CEO & Co-founder of LABFRESH & comitted Pond crowd equity investor
settings.quote: "I know firsthand how powerful community-backed growth can be.What excites me about Pondis that they’ve already built a loyal, global following around urban dipping. Now crowdfunding gives everyone a chance to be part of shaping that movement."

settings.author_title: CEO & Co-founder of Stride Partners & comitted Pond crowd equity investor
settings.quote: "What drew us to Pond is their rare combination of community, cultural relevance, and commerce. They’ve proven they can grow fast with limited resources, and now, with the right backing, they’re ready to unlock their potential. We believe Pond has everything it takes to become the defining brand of urban swimwear."

settings.title: Purposeful Collections That Enhance Life By The Water
settings.caption: By joining this round, you help us bring on our first internal fashion designer — one who will build full collections made for active urban dwellers and dedicated pond-lovers, prioritizing sustainability and purposeful features that enhance life by water.

settings.title: Our first Cph Dip Club House
settings.caption: The ultimate hub for the urban dipping community. A harbour-front space with a signature Pond sauna, water access, showroom, and store — built for connection, recovery, and shared experiences by the water.

settings.title: Every Body Swimwear & Apparel
settings.caption: Expanding inclusivity with new collections for female and diverse body types. Swimwear and apparel designed to celebrate different silhouettes, crafted with the same performance, comfort, and climate-friendly ethos that define Pond.

settings.title: Gear Up For Next Funding Round
settings.caption: Targeting €1.5M revenue and +10% EBITDA by 2029. This growth creates strong return potential for our earliest investors (you!) while paving the way for new partners to join our mission: scaling Pond into the global brand for urban dipping.

settings.text:
We Aim to Raise A Minimum Of €50.000

Pre-Register Now to Show Your Support!

Receive Our Pitch Deck & Full Financial Insights Ahead of Everyone Else.

settings.caption:
SUPPORTER: €250 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €250
  • €20 gift card to spend on Pond products
  • Co-owner newsletter & collection updates
  • Name on digital “Investor Wall” (optional)

FAN: €750 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €750
  • €50 gift card to spend on Pond products
  • All Supporter benefits

ANGEL: €1.500 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €1.500
  • €100 gift card to spend on Pond products
  • 1 free sauna access per month at Dip Club House
  • Invitation to yearly online co-creation session on upcoming collections
  • All Fan benefits

GAME-CHANGER: €5.000 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €5.000
  • 20% co-owner discount for 24 months (combines with all other discounts)
  • 1 free sauna access per week at Dip Club House
  • Invitation to VIP product development session in Copenhagen or Portugal (travel not included)
  • All Angel benefits

LIFE-CHANGER: €10.000 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €10.000
  • 25% co-owner discount for 3 years
  • Unlimited lifetime sauna access at Dip Club House
  • Invitation to Annual Co-Owner Get-Together in Copenhagen (travel not included)
  • All Game-Changer benefits

POND-MASTER: €15.000 

Perks & benefits

  • Shareholding worth €15.000
  • Lifetime 25% co-owner discount
  • Private brand vision & strategy call with the founders
  • Access to campaign shoots, showroom previews & internal planning decks
  • All Life-Changer benefits

settings.title: How does this work?
settings.body:
This pre-registration phase helps us evalutate the interest from our core community before launching the full campaign.

  • Indicate your preferred investment package by pre-registrating. This is non-binding, no funds are charged now.
  • You’ll be notified when the official campaign goes live (expected November 2025).
  • Full financial insights, and final company valuation will be available to all who pre-register before campaign goes live.

More about investing through crowd equity

settings.title: What is crowd equity?
settings.body: Crowd equity is a way for companies to raise capital by offering small ownership stakes to many investors through an online platform. Unlike traditional crowdfunding, where backers receive products or rewards, crowd equity investors become shareholders who can benefit financially if the company grows in value.

settings.title: Who can invest?
settings.body: We welcome everyone as co-owners. However, due to tax laws, US & Canadian citizens are currently excluded.

settings.title: What will the valuation of the company be, pre-funding?
settings.body: We are still finalizing the exact numbers, as early investor interest may influence the final valuation. At this stage, we expect the pre-money valuation of the company to be in the range of 5–8 million DKK (approx. €670.000–€1.070.000).

settings.title: Will I get a say in company decisions?
settings.body: No, you won’t have voting rights. Think of it like this: you get to share in the upside if the company does well, but the steering wheel stays with the main owners. That way, we can keep decisions quick and focused, while you still benefit from being part of the journey.

settings.title: What platform will host  the raise & manage the equity?
settings.body: We expect to host the campaign and eventual equity management on Crowdcube.com. Crowdcube is a leading European equity crowdfunding platform, that enables companies to raise capital by offering ownership stakes to a broad audience of investors. Crowdcube is authorised and regulated by the CNMV in Europe and the FCA in the UK.

settings.title: How do I contact you about the crowd campaign?
settings.body: Reach out to us at invest@pondcph.dk, and we will be happy to answer any questions you might have.

settings.text:
Born in Copenhagen, the harbour-bath capital of the world, Pond is the first brand created for the global movement of urban dippers, combining a Scandinavian design-approach with clever functionality and premium, eco-conscious tech-fabrics.

With shipments to over 30 countries, +65% accumulated annual growth, and a loyal global community built on limited resources, we’re now ready to scale, and we want you with us!

Pond is co-owned by Mikkel Bechshøft, Anders Krygell, Mads Sander & Jesper Strebøl. Pond Cph ApS is registered in Denmark, VAT DK42120715.
